title._content: "Solana," Frederick Forrest Peabody house, Eucalyptus Hill Road, Montecito, California. (LOC)

description._content: Johnston, Frances Benjamin,, 1864-1952,, photographer. ["Solana," Frederick Forrest Peabody house, Eucalyptus Hill Road, Montecito, California. Courtyard] [1917 spring] 1 photograph : glass lantern slide, hand-colored ; 3.25 x 4 in. Notes: Slide for lecture "California Gardens" as no. 59. Site History. House Architecture: Francis Townsend Underhill, built 1913-1914. Landscape: Charles Frederick Eaton, from 1906. Associated Name: Katherine Burke (Mrs. Frederick Forest) Peabody. Today: Garden subdivided. Monterey court. Slide used with lecture "California Gardens" as no. 59. Title, date, and subject information provided by Sam Watters, 2011. Forms part of: Garden and historic house lecture series in the Frances Benjamin Johnston Collection (Library of Congress). Published in Gardens for a Beautiful America / Sam Watters. New York: Acanthus Press, 2012. Plate 133. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ppmsca.16053 Call Number: LC-J717-X97- 54
